actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials

official_title: To amend the Solid Waste Disposal Act to define the term "yard waste".

summary.text: Amends the Solid Waste Disposal Act to define "yard waste" for purposes of such Act as discarded leaves, grass clippings, tree or shrubbery trimmings, Christmas trees, gardening residues, or other similar refuse materials composed of vegetative matter.

titles.title: To amend the Solid Waste Disposal Act to define the term "yard waste".
